text:
commons-net 1.4.0

<ftp action="get"
        server="xxxx"
        userid="yyyy"
        password="zzzz"
        remotedir="/e:/logs/W3SVC125"
        depends="yes"
        verbose="yes"
        separator="\">

If not using verbose="yes" works fine.
creator: perryhg@gmail.com

text:
(In reply to comment #0)
sorry, mis-copied content

<ftp action="get"
        server="xxxx"
        userid="yyyy"
        password="zzzz"
        remotedir="/e:/logs/W3SVC125"
        depends="yes"
        passive="yes"
        separator="\">

If not using passive="yes" works fine.
creator: perryhg@gmail.com

text: Could you please attach the stack trace?  Just run Ant with -verbose.
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text:
